common.title: 2026 Two Weeks in China (240h Visa Free)
common.description: The Ultimate China Visa-Free Guide 2026: 240-hour (10-day) transit policy, digital survival kit, and 10-day itineraries.
common.footer_note: This guide is based on the latest policy announced in January 2026.

hero.subtitle: Maximize the 240-hour (10-day) transit policy. Everything you need: Policies, Digital Survival Kit, and Perfect Itineraries.

policy.title: The Ultimate China Visa-Free Guide 2026
policy.card_twov_p1: As of Jan 2026, the Transit Without Visa (TWOV) policy has been extended to 240 hours (10 days) at 65 ports including Beijing, Shanghai, and GBA.
policy.card_twov_p2: The A -> China -> C rule determines eligibility.
policy.card_unilateral_desc: Unilateral visa-free entry for citizens of France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, etc. New additions include Sweden.

rules.title: China Entry Requirements & Digital Arrival Card
rules.arrival_card_desc: Replace paper forms with the new Digital Arrival Card available since Nov 2025.
rules.fingerprint_desc: Exemption until end of 2026 for short-term visas (<180 days).
rules.police_reg_desc: Mandatory 'Police Registration' within 24h. Hotels do it for you; Airbnb/friends require online self-declaration.
rules.abc_title: The Golden Rule: A -> B -> C
rules.abc_alert_desc: You must hold a confirmed ticket to Country C. Country A and Country C cannot be the same.

payment.title: Payment Guide: Alipay & WeChat
payment.subtitle: Link Visa/Mastercard
payment.content: Link your foreign cards to Alipay/WeChat Pay. Transactions under 200 RMB are fee-free. No cash needed.

internet.title: Internet: eSIM vs VPN
internet.subtitle: Bypass the firewall
internet.content: eSIM (e.g., Airalo) is recommended as it bypasses the GFW automatically. VPNs can be unstable.

apps.title: Essential Apps
apps.subtitle: Trip.com, DiDi, 12306
apps.content: Trip.com for bookings, DiDi (English) for rides, 12306 for official train tickets, and a translation app.

accommodation.title: Booking Hotels
accommodation.subtitle: Foreigner friendly
accommodation.content: Ensure your hotel accepts foreigners (search via Trip.com filters).

more.title: Compliance Note
more.desc: 240 hours start from 00:00 the day after entry. Actual stay can be nearly 11 days.

k_visa.subtitle: New Oct 2025 Policy
k_visa.desc: The K-Visa allows young STEM talents to enter China for job hunting or entrepreneurship without a pre-secured employer sponsor.

digital_survival.payment_setup_desc: Pay like a local without cash

eligibility.title: China Visa Eligibility Checker (2026)
eligibility.description: Check if you are eligible for the 240-hour visa-free transit or 15/30-day visa-free entry.
eligibility.heading: Check Your Eligibility
eligibility.subheading: Find out if you can travel to China visa-free with the latest 2026 policies.

result.desc_15d: You can enter China without a visa for up to 15 days for business, tourism, family visit and transit.
result.desc_30d: You can enter China without a visa for up to 30 days for business, tourism, family visit and transit.
result.desc_240h: You are eligible for the 240-hour (10-day) visa-free transit policy. Please ensure you meet the A -> China -> C transit rule.
result.desc_visa: You likely need a visa to enter China. Please check with your local Chinese embassy.
result.abc_reminder: Remember the A -> China -> C rule: You must have a confirmed ticket to a third country (C) different from your origin (A).
result.disclaimer: This tool is for reference only. Please consult official sources for the most accurate information.

visa_policy.title: Visa Policy Guide
visa_policy.twov_intro: The 240-hour (10-day) visa-free transit is the highlight of 2026 policies.
visa_policy.twov_rule_desc: You must fly from Country A (Origin) to Country C (Third Country) via Country B (China). A and C cannot be the same country.
visa_policy.twov_region_desc: Includes Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, Shanghai-Jiangsu-Zhejiang, and the GBA (Guangdong).
visa_policy.unilateral_desc: Visa-free entry for citizens of 48 countries (France, Germany, Italy, etc.) extended to Dec 31, 2026. No third-country ticket required.
visa_policy.arrival_card_desc: Since Nov 20, 2025, fill out the arrival card online 24-72 hours in advance via 'NIA 12367' APP.

best_time.title: Best Time to Visit
best_time.spring_desc: Great weather. Ideal for Beijing, Xi'an and Shanghai.
best_time.autumn_desc: Golden season. Best scenery in Sichuan and Yunnan.
best_time.rec_2026: 2026 Special: Harbin Ice Festival (Jan-Feb) or Canton Fair (Apr/Oct).

cost.title: Travel Cost & Budget
cost.payment_desc: Alipay/WeChat: Fee-free for transactions under 200 RMB. 3% fee for amounts above.

safety.title: Safety & Scams
safety.general_desc: China is very safe. Low violent crime rates. Extensive surveillance coverage.
safety.scam_tea_desc: Friendly strangers inviting you to tea/karaoke. Result: Astronomical bill. Solution: Decline and pick your own place.
safety.scam_taxi_desc: Ignore touts at airports. Use DiDi app or official taxi queues.
safety.health_water: Tap water is NOT potable. Drink bottled or boiled water.
safety.digital_vpn: Google/WhatsApp blocked. Use eSIM (recommended) or VPN.
